about_the_game:
Can you control chance?

Find out in Wish Us Luck. A single-player interactive fiction with multiple endings, in which you must take hard decisions to make it in the big city.

You play three characters: a down-on-his-luck driver addicted to gambling; a young actress who can’t make ends meet; a soccer star encumbered by the pressure of fame. Three strangers struggling to thrive on an eventful day. Their fates, intertwined by the puzzling cogs of chance. A minor choice you make for one may produce dire consequences to the others.

Ready to make hard choices? Good luck.

Features:

  • - multiplot narrative - three interconnected stories
  • - immersive story with depth and lifelike characters
  • - unique artstyle
  • - hours of replayability - choose different paths and meet completely new characters

Meet your characters


Samuel, Alice and Anderson. The fates of these three people are in your hands.
Wanna learn their stories?



Alice is a young and talented actress who can't make ends meet. Waitress by day and magician's assistant by night, she's on the verge of losing both jobs. Now she finds out she's pregnant by her ex, to make matters worse, or maybe better.
What will she get by the end of the day? Fame? Love? Stability? You get to chose.



Rising soccer star "Andy 10" is finally back to his hometown... to play finals against his former team. Half the city loves him, the other half calls him a traitor. There's pressure from everyone: his team, his agents, his fans and also his past, which came back haunting. Will he cave in or will he be the hero of the evening? That's up to you.



Samuel is an app driver. Once he used his skills as a statistician to gamble, and it paid off. But after a losing streak, he lost all his money and his wife. Oh, a loan shark is on his tail, too. Now Samuel will try not to lose his son and his life. He bet all his money that Andy 10's team will lose. And a mysterious object left on the backseat of Samuel's car may give him the means to control his fate.

So how do I play?


There are 13 chapters, and you'll get to play our three heroes in all of them.

Meet and engage in conversation with many intriguing characters.



Explore the city and its lively locations.



Use apps to express yourself, communicate and make a living.



Dozens of characters to meet. Will you discover them all?



And remember:
Every little decision you make matters.

content_descriptors.notes: Very little realistic blood in the game. Other than that, the content is appropriate for teens.

short_description: Wish Us Luck is a multi-plot interactive fiction fueled by your hard decisions. Play three strangers whose fates are intertwined by the cogs of chance on an eventful day. But remember: favoring one character means jeopardizing the others. Good Luck.
